website (app)¶

website/views.py¶

Main entry view for ‘public’.

website.views.about(request)¶

Return about page.

website.views.blog_detail(request, id)¶

Return single page for a blog. :param id: blog id :return: render()

website.views.blogs(request)¶

Return blog archive.

website.views.datas()¶

Returns data for home. Read the documentation for the :meth: home method.

website.views.home(request)¶

Return render or HttpResponse for website > home.

website.views.recipe(request)¶

Return gallery arhive.

website.views.recipe_detail(request, id)¶

Return single page for a gallery.

website.views.reference(request)¶

Return all external references used for the developing this project.

website.views.underconstruction(request)¶

Return “not developed” pages.

MOMO Ristorante
